arc_stage: Stage 1 â€“ Desperation & doubt: feels rejected, frustrated, and believes she will never be good enough. No internship yet.
transcript:
March 12th, 2023

I hope this entry makes sense. I've been trying to calm myself down for what feels like hours. Today was supposed to be an ordinary day - attend classes, work on projects, and maybe squeeze in some phone calls with potential internship leads. But as soon as the morning sun streamed through my window (too bright), I felt my anxiety spike.

segments.text:
March 12th, 2023

I hope this entry makes sense.
I've been trying to calm myself down for what feels like hours.
Today was supposed to be an ordinary day - attend classes, work on projects, and maybe squeeze in some phone calls with potential internship leads.
But as soon as the morning sun streamed through my window (too bright), I felt my anxiety spike.

summary: The writer is struggling with anxiety on March 12th, 2023, which began with a sudden trigger - the morning sunlight - and disrupted their plans for an ordinary day of attending classes and making phone calls about potential internships. They've been trying to calm down for hours.
